title: Tactical Language Communication Competency Development Program for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental understanding of team activities
context.additional_context: Scenario-based activity design to enhance real-time interaction in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately use target language tactical expressions over 80% of the time in simulation activities reflecting real-world communication contexts.
Learners can creatively apply situational language strategies three or more times through collaborative tasks with peers.
Learners can maintain strategic language behaviors for 90 minutes and achieve a success rate of over 75% in simulated assessment games.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
